title: (x) Nice Bold Script font. - lettering by Nick Cooke {Nick Cooke himself}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230703im_/http:/typophile.com/files/TYPO-kussenzacht_6356.jpg)

I really love to know the name of this script or Black Italic?

Thanks! A+
author: Allison Dh

comments.content:
It isn't a typeface - I designed the lettering for Turner Duckworth Design. If I recall correctly it was for Dutch and French toilet rolls.

Out of interest, where did you get that image Allison?

Hi Nick! I had a feeling this was 'custom' done.  
Great work! I had already added your [Geetype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150307230703/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/gtype/geetype/?&sample_text=Kussenzacht%20Coussin%C3%A9&update=0) to my list ;-)

Indeed, it's toilet paper.

I'll send you a mail in a few moments.

Allison.

Nick,

Very nice rhythm in this script. You should make it into a typeface!

Keep up the good work.

Cheers

Thanks Stefan. Hmmm.... I'm thinking about it, as I've had other requests for it.

You keep up the good work too!

Loving that ‘k’.

Was it for a packaing project? Would love to see it.
